columnDefinition.name: Condition
columnDefinition.description: Expression which must evaluate to TRUE in order for install to commence.

columnDefinition.name: Message
columnDefinition.description: Localizable text to display when condition fails and install must abort.

columnDefinition.name: PackageId
columnDefinition.description: PackageId for the Prereq BA to conditionally install.

columnDefinition.name: SuppressOptionsUI
columnDefinition.description: If 1, don't show Options button during install.

columnDefinition.name: SuppressDowngradeFailure
columnDefinition.description: If 1, attempts to downgrade are treated as a successful no-op.

columnDefinition.name: SuppressRepair
columnDefinition.description: If 1, don't show Repair button during maintenance.

columnDefinition.name: ShowVersion
columnDefinition.description: If 1, show the version number on the UI.

columnDefinition.name: ShowFilesInUse
columnDefinition.description: If 1, show a special page when files are in use.

columnDefinition.name: SupportCacheOnly
columnDefinition.description: If 1, the bundle can be pre-cached using the /cache command line argument.
